title: Otto Esports Looking For Diamond 5+ ADC.
body: Add me ingame for details and to chat

replies.body:
im preferrable a smurf on a bronze 4 account and I'm trying to rank it up but i never get lucky with the bronze teams. I've been to diamond before so I'm looking for a support main to duo with. i have quite a big adc pool. with jinx, ashe, vayne, corki, tristana, twitch, mf, lucian, sivir
i will add you. 4rtificialalpha is in game name
LOL what a load of crap kid
